faq.subtitle: Our FAQ, get your questions answered.
faq.conteudo1: When using our app, we request permission to access your email, names, photos, allow entry into groups, and view groups. These permissions aim to personalize your experience, facilitate communication, provide an enhanced visual interface, and promote dynamic social interactions. We are committed to treating this data responsibly, following strict privacy standards as detailed in our comprehensive privacy policy.
faq.conteudo2: The security of your data is an unwavering priority for the Hong APP. We commit to storing all information in strict accordance with our privacy policy. You can trust that we have implemented the most rigorous security measures to ensure the integrity and confidentiality of your data, providing you with a reliable and protected experience in our app.

blog.title: Hong APP Blog
blog.text: I love creating websites, and this time, I decided to build something that allows others to study the code and customize it to their liking.
